verses.verse: These are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to make <S%H3772><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> besides the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7200><s%> You have seen all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and to all his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and to all his land; <S%H776><s%>
the great <S%H1419><s%> trials <S%H4531><s%> which your eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw, <S%H7200><s%> the signs, <S%H226><s%> and those great <S%H1419><s%> wonders: <S%H4159><s%>

but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not given <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> to know, <S%H3045><s%> and eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> and ears <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H8085><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

I have led <S%H3212><s%> you forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> your clothes <S%H8008><s%> have not grown old <S%H1086><s%> on you, <S%H5275><s%> and your shoes have not grown old <S%H1086><s%> on your feet. <S%H7272><s%>

You have not eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither have you drunk <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink; <S%H7941><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

When you came <S%H935><s%> to this place, <S%H4725><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us to battle, <S%H4421><s%> and we struck them: <S%H5221><s%>

and we took <S%H3947><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the Manassites. <S%H4520><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, <S%H7919><s%> that you may prosper in all that you do. <S%H6213><s%>

You stand <S%H5324><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> all of you before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> your heads, <S%H7218><s%> your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> your elders, <S%H2205><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> even all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> your wives, <S%H802><s%> and your foreigner <S%H1616><s%> who is in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of your camps, <S%H4264><s%> from the one who cuts <S%H2404><s%> your wood <S%H6086><s%> to the one who draws <S%H7579><s%> your water; <S%H4325><s%>

that you may enter <S%H5674><s%> into the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and into his oath, <S%H423><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> makes <S%H3772><s%> with you this day; <S%H3117><s%>

that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to himself for a people, <S%H5971><s%> and that he may be to you a God, <S%H430><s%> as he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H7650><s%> and as he swore to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Neither with you only do I make <S%H3772><s%> this covenant <S%H1285><s%> and this oath, <S%H423><s%>

but with him who stands <S%H5975><s%> here with us this <S%H3426><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and also with him who is not here with us this day <S%H3117><s%>

(for you know <S%H3045><s%> how we lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and how we came <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the nations <S%H1471><s%> through which you passed; <S%H7130><s%>

and you have seen <S%H7200><s%> their abominations, <S%H8251><s%> and their idols, <S%H1544><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone, <S%H68><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> which were among them);

lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you man, <S%H376><s%> or woman, <S%H802><s%> or family, <S%H4940><s%> or tribe, <S%H7626><s%> whose heart <S%H3824><s%> turns away <S%H6437><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of those nations; <S%H1471><s%> lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you a root <S%H8328><s%> that bears <S%H6509><s%> gall <S%H7219><s%> and wormwood; <S%H3939><s%>

and it happen, <S%H8085><s%> when he hears the words <S%H1697><s%> of this curse, <S%H423><s%> that he bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I shall have peace, <S%H7965><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the stubbornness <S%H8307><s%> of my heart, <S%H3820><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> the moist <S%H7302><s%> with the dry. <S%H6771><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not pardon <S%H5545><s%> him, <S%H639><s%> but then the anger of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and his jealousy <S%H7068><s%> will smoke <S%H6225><s%> against that man, <S%H376><s%> and all the curse <S%H423><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> shall lie <S%H7257><s%> on him, <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh will blot out <S%H4229><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> from under the sky. <S%H8064><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will set him apart <S%H914><s%> to evil <S%H7451><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to all the curses <S%H423><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law. <S%H8451><s%>

The generation <S%H1755><s%> to come, <S%H314><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> who shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, <S%H5237><s%> and the foreigner who shall come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of that land, <S%H776><s%> and the sicknesses <S%H8463><s%> with which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made it sick; <S%H2470><s%>

and that the whole land <S%H776><s%> of it is sulfur, <S%H1614><s%> salt, <S%H4417><s%> and burning, <S%H8316><s%> that it is not sown, <S%H2232><s%> nor bears, <S%H6779><s%> nor any grass <S%H6212><s%> grows <S%H5927><s%> therein, <S%H4114><s%> like the overthrow of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Admah <S%H126><s%> and Zeboiim, <S%H6636><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%> in his anger, <S%H639><s%> and in his wrath: <S%H2534><s%>

even all the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> "Why has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> thus to this land? <S%H776><s%> What does the heat <S%H2750><s%> of this great <S%H1419><s%> anger mean? <S%H639><s%>"

Then men shall say, <S%H559><s%> "Because they forsook the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them when he brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

and went <S%H3212><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> them, <S%H430><s%> gods that they didn't <S%H3045><s%> know, and that he had not given to them: <S%H2505><s%>

therefore the anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against this land, <S%H776><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> on it all the curse <S%H7045><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book; <S%H5612><s%>

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rooted <S%H5428><s%> them out of their land <S%H127><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> and in wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation, <S%H7110><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into another <S%H312><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> as at this day. <S%H3117><s%>"

The secret <S%H5641><s%> things belong to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> but the things that are revealed <S%H1540><s%> belong to us and to our children <S%H1121><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> that we may do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law. <S%H8451><s%>
